str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: How much, how great, how many, as great as, as much. By reduplication from hos; as As.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: Lit: I dip, submerge, but specifically of ceremonial dipping; I baptize.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To put on, clothe (another). From en and duno; to invest with clothing.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.
